name: One day-one new culture-one new cuisine art. Hanoi is in your hands!
description: Hanoi - the ancient capital of Vietnam is a peaceful city. The city has always left good impression for visitors with unique experience. Its residents are courteous, charming, and hospitality. Hidden inside an evolving city, the ancient beauty of Hanoi still remained until now and preserved historic grandeur of the nation. Moreover, Hanoi is on top 10 of the most attractive cuisines in the world (according to Lonely planet travel magazine). So, let’s explore the unique beauty of Hanoi.
